cucumber.api

Interface HookTestStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TestStep

    public interface HookTestStep
extends TestStep
    Hooks are invoked before and after each scenario and before and after each gherkin step in a scenario.
    See Also:
    TestCaseStarted, TestCaseFinished
